item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

Moved to Anna Liffeys!!!!!


This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location is: CASEUS http://www.caseusnewh...

Caseus is a great addition to the growing New Haven gourmet scene. We had a lovely beer/cheese/wine tasting there in May (http://www.meetup.com...) and the owner, Jason, is thrilled to have us back! I'm excited too - Caseus has a wonderfully cozy feel, a kind and knowledgable staff... and good food and drink. Caseus' motto is 'Every cheese has a story.' Sounds kind of cheesy, right? (Oh goodness... I did not even mean that pun.... smack me when you see me? Please? Negative reinforcement will be my only cure for being such a dork lol) However, ask Jason about anything in his wonderful shop and you'll be persuaded - he has a great infectious enthusiasm for what he sells, and has obviously selected his wares with care.

Please note that this event is CASH ONLY

Come join us : )

Your contact is: Devorah (phone number in RSVP)

Jason, from Caseus, has just emailed me with some great food offerings. Caseus normally isn?t open on Mondays ? so it?s so nice of him to put together a mini-menu for us to purchase from! The offerings are:

CHEESE BOARD
SELECTED BY OUR MONGERS FOR SEASONALITY & PEAK RIPENESS ACCOMPANIED BY OUR BEST PRESERVES, NUTS & LOCAL BREADS
SELECTION OF FOUR

CHARCUTERIE BOARD
SEASONAL BOARD OF OUR BEST
PATES WITH DRY CURED MEATS & SALUMI ACCOMPANIED BY MUSTARDS, PICKLED MIX AND LOCAL BREADS
SELECTION OF FOUR

CRISPY GOAT CHEESE
GREEN OLIVE TAPENADE
RED PEPPER JELLY

POUTINE
CHEESE CURDS, POMMES FRITES, VELOUTE

TART DU JOUR
PATE BRISEE, SEASONAL VEG,
CHEESE , MIXED GREENS

GRILLED CHEESE BITES
OUR BEST MELTING CHEESES
RUSTIC BREAD

CHILI AND CHEESE
NIMAN RANCH BEEF,
MELTED XTRA SHARP VERMONT CHEDDAR
TOAST

POMMES FRITES

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.

Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.name: monday night drinks - anna liffeys
